summary: P0 Carousel Layout Bug Fix - VERIFIED WORKING. Tested carousel layout and navigation for the Genturix resident UI. All 5 modules (Emergency, Visits, Reservations, Directory, Profile) fill the available screen height correctly with no black space at the bottom. Tab navigation via bottom nav works correctly. Vertical scroll within modules (tested in Profile) works as expected.

minor.issue: Returns 403 for test resident user - may be expected behavior based on role permissions
Returns 404 'Condominio no encontrado' - test user may not have associated condominium
Returns 404 'Condominio no encontrado' - same issue as reservations

critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: Carousel uses percentage-based widths (100/TAB_ORDER.length)% for proper responsive sizing
GOOD: Each module has paddingBottom: 'calc(72px + env(safe-area-inset-bottom, 16px))' to account for bottom nav
GOOD: dragConstraints set to {left:0, right:0} with dragElastic=0.15 for natural feel
GOOD: dragMomentum=false prevents overshooting multiple modules
GOOD: handleDragEnd limits navigation to ONE module at a time with newIndex = Math.max(0, Math.min(activeIndex + direction, TAB_ORDER.length - 1))
GOOD: ResidentLayout uses 100dvh for proper mobile viewport handling
GOOD: Each module container has overflow-y-auto and WebkitOverflowScrolling: 'touch' for smooth native-like scrolling
context_for_next_testing_agent: Carousel layout fix verified. Key implementation: Framer Motion drag-based carousel with percentage widths, single-module navigation constraint, and proper paddingBottom for bottom nav clearance. Test resident user may not have associated condominium which causes 404s on reservations/areas APIs - not a bug in carousel implementation.
